Publications

2018
I. Gessinger, A. Schweitzer, B. Andreeva, E. Raveh, B. Möbius, I. Steiner: "Convergence of Pitch Accents in a Shadowing Task." In: Proceedings of Speech Prosody 9, Poznań/Poland. In review.
2017
I. Gessinger, E. Raveh, S. Le Maguer, B. Möbius, I. Steiner: "Shadowing Synthesized Speech – Segmental Analysis of Phonetic Convergence." In: Proceedings of Interspeech, Stockholm/Sweden, p. 3797-3801. [Talk]
I. Gessinger, B. Möbius, I. Steiner: "Capturing Phonetic Convergence by Global Analysis of Spectral Distance." In: Proceedings of Phonetik und Phonologie 13, Berlin/Germany, p. xx. [Talk]
E. Raveh, I. Gessinger, S. Le Maguer, B. Möbius, I. Steiner: "Investigating Phonetic Convergence in a Shadowing Experiment with Synthetic Stimuli." In: Proceedings of the 28th Conference on Electronic Speech Signal Processing (ESSV), Saarbrücken/Germany, p. 254-261. [Poster]
2016
I. Gessinger, E. Raveh, J. O’Mahony, I. Steiner, B. Möbius: "A Shadowing Experiment with Natural and Synthetic Stimuli." In: Proceedings of Phonetik und Phonologie 12, Munich/Germany, p. 58-61. [Poster]
2015
I. Gessinger: "Foreign Accent Imitation Under the Condition of Enhanced Intelligibility." In: Proceedings of the 24th annual conference of the International Association for Forensic Phonetics and Acoustics (IAFPA), Leiden/The Netherlands. [Talk]
